t: Inside Amazon’s sustainability lab: Grueling tests forge the future of planet-friendly plastics
s: 3 weeks ago - Plastic films are slowly stretched to the point of breaking. They’re sliced with a blade on a tiny pendulum, and poked until they puncture. At the Amazon sustainability lab — an uncluttered, windowless space in the industrial zone south of Seattle’s sports stadiums — researchers are testing new plant-based “biopolyesters” that could one day be used in carrot bags...
